docs.lead_paragraph: Prescott residents are trying to come up with a plan to save a fire station that housed 19 firefighters who died in a 2013 wildfire before the city decides to sell the building.

docs.lead_paragraph: Lizzy Wendell scored 25 points, leading three Bulldogs to reach 20, and No. 22 Drake beat Wichita State 105-89 on Saturday, winning its 19th straight game and becoming the first team to go undefeated in Missouri Valley Conference regular-season play.

headline.main: No. 22 Drake Women Finish Perfect MVC Regular Season
headline.print_headline: No. 22 Drake Women Finish Perfect MVC Regular Season

docs.lead_paragraph: More than two-thirds of French voters want conservative candidate Francois Fillon to withdraw his presidential bid following an alleged fake job's scandal, according to an Ifop poll for the weekly Journal du Dimanche newspaper.

headline.main: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's Hydro One Ltd is in talks to buy municipal electricity distributor Toronto Hydro Corp for about C$3 billion (1.82 billion pounds) as the city of Toronto explores options to finance various infrastructure projects, people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.
